name: cookie clicker (itch) (Brillie)
description:
If it doesn't work pls tell me in comments cause nothing is working for me right now lol, and if it does work properly then let me know about that too lol

Welcome to cookie clicker! I finished rebirths, you must have at least 1.5m cookies to rebirth and when it give you a option to rebirth if you want to rebirth then type yes or Yes and you can only rebirth ONCE. A golden cookie will spawn from 2 minutes to 5 minutes and it can give from 10 cookies to 15000 cookies!
